smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ManifestActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'View' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'AppActionsDialog' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'View' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'RepackagedDetectionPresenter' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'RepackagedDetectionFragment' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LocalStatisticsPresenter' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AppListFragment' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LocalPermissionsFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface View is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface View is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getItem appears to be too complex.
The function getPageTitle appears to be too complex.
The function onLoadFinished appears to be too complex.
The function setupCharts appears to be too complex.
The function readManifest appears to be too complex.
The function get appears to be too complex.
The function get appears to be too complex.
The function get appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function add is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function setStatistics has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function readManifest is nested too deeply.
Function getMinSdkVersion is nested too deeply.
Function get is nested too deeply.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses around the lambda ({ _, isChecked -> presenter.uploadCheckBoxStateChange(isChecked) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (AppDetailPagerContract.ARG_PAGER_PAGE) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: AppDetailPagerContract.ARG_PAGER_PAGE
Parentheses in (throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot query unknown URI " + uri)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot query unknown URI " + uri)
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM
Parentheses in (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN

Parentheses in (requestedPermissionFlags[index] and PackageInfo.REQUESTED_PERMISSION_GRANTED != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: requestedPermissionFlags[index] and PackageInfo.REQUESTED_PERMISSION_GRANTED != 0
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM
Parentheses in (it.flags and FeatureInfo.FLAG_REQUIRED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.flags and FeatureInfo.FLAG_REQUIRED

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.description: Private member is unused.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class BarDataHolder defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class LocalStatisticsDataWithCharts defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class FileData contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getOnlyHash
